name: io.github.wwwwujl/yuque-mcp
title: Yuque MCP
description: Yuque MCP server with safe read/write tools for groups, group members, repositories, docs, and TOC.

environmentVariables.name: YUQUE_ALLOW_WRITE
environmentVariables.description: Enable write tools when true (optional, default false)

environmentVariables.name: YUQUE_WRITE_NAMESPACE_ALLOWLIST
environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated namespace allowlist for repo/doc/toc writes (optional)

environmentVariables.name: YUQUE_WRITE_GROUP_ALLOWLIST
environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated group login allowlist for group writes (optional)

environmentVariables.name: YUQUE_ALLOW_DELETE
environmentVariables.description: Enable delete tools when true (optional, default false)

environmentVariables.name: YUQUE_FILE_ROOT
environmentVariables.description: Allowed root directory for file-based doc tools (optional, default current working directory)

environmentVariables.name: YUQUE_FILE_MAX_BYTES
environmentVariables.description: Maximum size for file-based doc tools (optional, default 1048576)

environmentVariables.name: YUQUE_FILE_ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS
environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated allowed extensions for file-based doc tools (optional, default .md,.markdown,.txt)
